attributes.additional_details: students desperate for a higher education can’t always afford it because of how expensive it is. this isn’t fair because everyone should have the opportunity to further their education and knowledge to become anything they want to be. sometimes money needs to be borrowed and overtime the money you owe grows and you are left most of your life with a student debt.
attributes.background: i want the government to make university expenses more cheaper so those who want further education and can’t currently afford it can get it

rejection.details:
We understand that you want the Government to reduce the cost of going to university, but it's not clear what action you want the Government to take to achieve this.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. This could be reducing the maximum level of tuition fees, or introducing grants for prospective students from lower income families.
